trans-unit.source: Provides a threading service that allows the host application creating a workflow instance to donate the <xref href="System.Threading.Thread"></xref> on which the workflow instance is run.
trans-unit.target: Er en trådmodell tjeneste som gjør at verten appen oppretter en arbeidsflytforekomst kan gi den <xref href="System.Threading.Thread"> </xref> på arbeidsflytforekomsten kjører.

trans-unit.source: Using this threading service, host applications can run a workflow instance on a single <xref href="System.Threading.Thread"></xref> in synchronous mode (although if the workflow contains a delay activity, the work is postponed until after the delay activity is executed on a separate thread spawned by [System.Threading.Timer](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)).This mode blocks the execution of the host application until the workflow instance becomes idle.
trans-unit.target: Bruker dette threading tjenesten, vertsprogrammer kan kjøre en arbeidsflytforekomst på én <xref href="System.Threading.Thread"> </xref> i synkron modus (selv om hvis arbeidsflyten inneholder en forsinkelse-aktivitet, arbeidet utsettes før etter at forsinkelse aktiviteten er utført på en egen tråd startet av [System.Threading.Timer](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)). Denne modusen blokkerer kjøring av vertsprogrammet til arbeidsflytforekomsten er inaktiv.

trans-unit.source: Subsequently, the workflow instance can only be executed using the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService.RunWorkflow*> method of this service.
trans-unit.target: Deretter arbeidsflytforekomsten kan bare utføres ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService.RunWorkflow*>metoden av denne tjenesten.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService.RunWorkflow*>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] ManualWorkflowSchedulerService does not automatically run a workflow instance that is in the queue.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]ManualWorkflowSchedulerService ikke har til automatisk å kjøre en arbeidsflytforekomst som er i køen.

trans-unit.source: The host must call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService.RunWorkflow%2A> to run a specified workflow.
trans-unit.target: Verten må kalle <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService.RunWorkflow%2A>til å kjøre en angitt arbeidsflyt.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService.RunWorkflow%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref> that determines how delay activities are handled.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref>som bestemmer hvordan forsinkelse aktiviteter behandles.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the scheduler service automatically resumes workflows after delay activities expire (by using an in-memory timer).
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, planleggingstjenesten automatisk igjen arbeidsflyter når forsinkelse aktiviteter utløper snart (ved hjelp av en tidtaker i minnet).

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the host must manually resume the workflow after the delay activities expire.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, må verten manuelt gjenoppta arbeidsflyten når forsinkelse aktivitetene utløper.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"></xref> that contains parameters for `useActiveTimers`.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"> </xref> som inneholder parametere for `useActiveTimers`.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the scheduler service automatically resumes workflows after delay activities expire (by using an in-memory timer).
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, planleggingstjenesten automatisk igjen arbeidsflyter når forsinkelse aktiviteter utløper snart (ved hjelp av en tidtaker i minnet).

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the host must manually resume the workflow after the delay activities expire.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, må verten manuelt gjenoppta arbeidsflyten når forsinkelse aktivitetene utløper.

trans-unit.source: Cancels the specified existing workflow instance work item.
trans-unit.target: Avbryter angitte eksisterende arbeidsflyten forekomsten arbeidselementet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> associated with the existing scheduled work item to cancel.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Guid>som er forbundet med eksisterende planlagte arbeidselementet å avbryte.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: Overloaded from <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStarted%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Overbelastet fra <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStarted%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called whenever <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is called and is used by the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService"></xref> to do work that is needed when the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> starts.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles når <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime%2A?displayProperty=fullName> kalles og brukes av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService"> </xref> fungerer som er nødvendig når den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"> </xref> starter.

trans-unit.source: Runs the specified workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Kjører den angitte arbeidsflytforekomsten.

trans-unit.source: This is a synchronous call that uses the current thread to run the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Dette er som bruker gjeldende tråd til å kjøre arbeidsflyten.

trans-unit.source: It does not return until the workflow idles, suspends, completes, terminates, or aborts.
trans-unit.target: Den returnerer ikke før arbeidsflyten angitt, stopper, er fullført, avslutter eller avbryter.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> for the workflow instance to run.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Guid>for arbeidsflytforekomsten til å kjøre.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the workflow starts running; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis arbeidsflyten starter kjører. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: workflowInstanceId is an empty GUID.
trans-unit.target: workflowInstanceIder en tom GUID.

trans-unit.source: Adds a workflow instance to the pending work items queue using the specified workflow instance using the specified multicast delegate.
trans-unit.target: Legger til en arbeidsflytforekomst Vent elementer køen med den angitte arbeidsflytforekomsten ved hjelp av den angitte multikastingsbyte representanten.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Threading.WaitCallback"></xref> multicast delegate that represents the method to run.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Threading.WaitCallback"> </xref> multikastingsbyte representanten som representerer metoden til å kjøre.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Guid> that represents the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Guid>som representerer arbeidsflytforekomsten.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: callback contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: callbackinneholder en nullreferanse ( i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified workflow instance to the pending work item queue using the specified multicast delegate, <xref:System.DateTime> and GUIDs.
trans-unit.target: Legger til den angitte arbeidsflytforekomsten Vent elementet køen med den angitte multikastingsbyte representanten <xref:System.DateTime>og GUIDer.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Threading.WaitCallback"></xref> multicast delegate that represents the method to run.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Threading.WaitCallback"> </xref> multikastingsbyte representanten som representerer metoden til å kjøre.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Guid> that represents the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Guid>som representerer arbeidsflytforekomsten.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> that indicates the time to begin running the thread.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.DateTime>som angir tid til å begynne å kjøre tråden.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Guid> that represents the scheduled thread.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Guid>som representerer planlagte tråden.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: callback contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: callbackinneholder en nullreferanse ( i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: workflowInstanceId or timerId is an empty GUID.
trans-unit.target: workflowInstanceIdeller timerId er en tom GUID.

trans-unit.source: Overloaded from <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Overbelastet fra <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService"></xref> uses this method to do work that is needed when the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> stops.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService"> </xref> bruker denne metoden fungerer som er nødvendig når den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"> </xref> stopper.
